QuestData.Title: Four Heads are Better than None
QuestData.Description: We're about to launch the attack upon the Twilight Gate, but there is one last loose end to tie up: Za'brox and Beeble'phod, the disciples of Cho'gall.$B$BIntelligence has placed them within the Den of the Disciples, a small ogre cave at the southwest corner of the Twilight Gate.$B$BWould you go back in there and kill them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the four heads of Za'brox and Beeble'phod.
